video.title: Corvette Nation
video.synopsis: Hosts Bill Stephens and Maria Prekeges pop the hood on Corvette cars and culture and celebrate everything related to America's iconic sports car.

episodes.synopsis: This series celebrating the immortal Chevy Corvette kicks off with an episode devoted to the C7 Stingray.
episodes.title: Return of the Stingray

episodes.synopsis: The team looks back at a seminal moment in Corvette history: the 24 Hours of Le Mans race of 1960.
episodes.title: The Quest

episodes.synopsis: Maria and Bill visit the world's largest Corvette fan event, Corvettes at Carlisle, where more than 5,000 cars assemble to parade, burn out and more.
episodes.title: Corvettes at Carlisle

episodes.synopsis: The hosts visit a special exhibit on the history and people behind the Corvette, and interview former Chevrolet general manager Jim Perkins.
episodes.title: The Great Hall

episodes.synopsis: The team revisits the iconic 1963 Corvette Stingray, visits private collections and talks with Stingray designer Peter Brock.
episodes.title: The Birth of the Stingray

episodes.synopsis: This episode reviews Corvette fan events, including the epic Woodward Dream Cruise, and visits Ken Lingenfelter's jaw-dropping private collection.
episodes.title: The Motor City

episodes.synopsis: The world descends on Effingham, Illinois, for Corvette Funfest, and the show sits down with "Corvette Bible" author and collector Mike Yager.
episodes.title: Funfest: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The show features more Corvette action from 2013's Funfest in Effingham, Illinois, and takes a look at Mike Yager's epic collection.
episodes.title: Funfest: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: This episode visits Lingenfelter Performance Engineering and profiles the Corvettes on display at the Woodward Dream Cruise.
episodes.title: Lingenfelter Performance

episodes.synopsis: The team visits the National Corvette Museum in Bowling Green, Kentucky, then watches new Corvettes roll off the assembly line at the nearby GM plant.
episodes.title: National Corvette Museum

episodes.synopsis: Bill straps in for thrills at the Ron Fellows Performance Driving School, then visits the nearby Spring Mountain Motorsports Ranch.
episodes.title: Ron Fellows

episodes.synopsis: The show heads to Las Vegas for the excitement of SEMA, the world's top automotive specialty products trade expo.
episodes.title: Season 1: Best of

episodes.synopsis: A sinkhole under the National Corvette Museum in Bowling Green, Kentucky, swallows up eight valuable vehicles.
episodes.title: Season 2: Sneak Peak

episodes.synopsis: The hosts report on the sinkhole that opened up under the National Corvette Museum and the 'Vettes -- valued at over $1 million -- that fell into it.
episodes.title: The Sinkhole

episodes.synopsis: The hosts examine technology that's keeping Corvettes on the cutting edge, then check out how viewers can make their 'Vettes uniquely special.
episodes.title: Retro-Vette

episodes.synopsis: At Bloomington Gold, Corvette owners from across the country meet to see how their vehicles stack up against the competition.
episodes.title: Bloomington Gold

episodes.synopsis: The hosts travel to Texas for a visit to a few of the Lone Star State's favorite local Corvette clubs.
episodes.title: Corvette Clubs: Texas

episodes.synopsis: The show is there when Chevrolet rolls out the more powerful 2015 Corvette Z06, then pays a visit to Corvette Racing.
episodes.title: Corvette Racing / Z06 Introduction

episodes.synopsis: More than 5,000 Corvettes and hordes of enthusiasts descend on Carlisle, Pa., for the annual event, the world's largest Corvette fan gathering.
episodes.title: Corvettes at Carlisle

episodes.synopsis: The show profiles the National Corvette Restorers Society, meets its skilled members and sees their stunning finished products.
episodes.title: NCRS

episodes.synopsis: The hosts enjoy the sights and sounds of 2014 Funfest, Mid America Motorworks' annual gathering in Effingham, Illinois.
episodes.title: Funfest: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The show features more highlights from Mid America Motorworks' Funfest 2014, which draws thousands of fans and classic Corvettes.
episodes.title: Funfest: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The hosts attend the 2014 SEMA show in Las Vegas, one of the world's largest expos of auto manufacturing and after-market products.
episodes.title: SEMA

episodes.synopsis: The hosts join the throng of Corvette enthusiasts descending on Reno, Nevada, for the 2014 Hot August Nights event.
episodes.title: Hot August Nights

episodes.synopsis: Relive the glory and mythology of Route 66, a uniquely American road whose history is forever entwined with that of the Corvette.
episodes.title: Route 66: The Tale of 2 Legends

episodes.synopsis: The show returns to the National Corvette Museum for the opening of its new NCM Motorsports Park, which offers the ultimate driving experience.
episodes.title: NCM Motorsports Park
